response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Considering its value and quality, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $140 for you. This is an excellent opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to the market value of $150. I trust it will meet your expectations and contribute positively to your endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 140}
